    • Method Detail

      • setPos

        public void setPos​(int x,
                   int y)
        This method sets the position of the car, and resets the expected x position value.
        Parameters:
        x - The new int value for the x location of the AI car.
        y - The new int value for the y location of the AI car.

      • setGameSpeed

        public void setGameSpeed​(int gameSpeed)
        This method sets the game speed value.
        Parameters:
        gameSpeed - New int value for how fast the car travels backwards.

      • setMoveSpeed

        public void setMoveSpeed​(int speed)
        This method sets the move speed value.
        Parameters:
        speed - New int value for how fast the car travels forward.

      • checkOutOfBounds

        public boolean checkOutOfBounds()
        This method checks if the car is completely outside the height border.

      • checkNeedsReset

        public boolean checkNeedsReset()
        This method returns if the car needs to be reseted or not.
        Returns:
        boolean true or false

      • checkLaneSwitch

        public void checkLaneSwitch​(greenfoot.Actor player)
        This checks if the AI car wants to switch lanes in attempts to collide with the player car.
        Parameters:
        player - Player object which is a subclass of the Actor class.

      • checkHitEdge

        public boolean checkHitEdge()
        This method checks if the car is hitting the edge.
        Returns:
        boolean True or false

      • checkCarIsOnExpectedPos

        public boolean checkCarIsOnExpectedPos()
        This method checks if the AI car is on the expected x postion.

      • act

        public void act()
        Act - do whatever the CarAI wants to do. This method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the environment.
        Overrides:
        act in class greenfoot.Actor
